name: Streaming template to load data from PubSub to GCS
description: Streaming template to load data from PubSub to GCS.

parameters.name: input_topic
parameters.label: Input PubSub Topic.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input PubSub topic to consume from.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input PubSub Subscription.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input PubSub Subscription to consume from.

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.label: Data Processing Windo Size (Minutes).
parameters.helpText: Fixed Window in minutes based on which data from PubSub would be collected into GCS.

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.label: Output path where the data would be stored.
parameters.helpText: Output path with file prefix. This would be used as a pattern to store data.

parameters.name: num_shards
parameters.label: No of Shards created per Window.
parameters.helpText: Number of shards created per Window.
